Title: Outdoor Metallic Swing (without Cushion) in Black Colour

Details.Dimensions:: H 52 x W 55 x D 42; Seating Height-20

Description: Fullstock Is one stop for creative, user friendly, contemporary furniture crafted keeping in mind consumer needs, new trends and budget. A swing is a hanging seat, often found at playgrounds for children and now also popularly used as items of indoor furniture. The seat of a swing may be suspended from chains or ropes. Once a swing is in motion, it continues to oscillate like a pendulum until external interference or drag brings it to a halt.
